Anime Show.ShowDescription: Attack on Titan is set in a world where humanity lives inside cities surrounded by three enormous walls that protect them from the gigantic man-eating humanoids referred to as Titans
Gon Freecs works hard to become a hunter while searching for the father he doesn't remember.
Anime Show.ShowEpisodes: The 2011 version has 6 seasons with 148 episodes total

Anime Show.ShowDescription: Demon Slayer follows teenage Tanjiro Kamado, who strives to become a demon slayer after his family was slaughtered and his younger sister Nezuko turned into a demon.
Haikyu story follows Shōyō Hinata, a boy determined to become a great volleyball player despite his small stature.

Yuji Itadori is a boy with tremendous physical strength, though he lives a completely ordinary high school life. One day, to save a classmate who has been attacked by curses, he eats the finger of Ryomen Sukuna, taking the curse into his own soul.
Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family after they raided his land, Thorfinn becomes a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father.
Scouring sprace fo rbounties, a ragtag crew- a former hitman, an ex-cop, a con artist, a hacker kid, and a data dog-live paycheck to paycheck.

One Punch Man tells the story of Saitama, a superhero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch but seeks to find a worthy opponent after growing bored by a lack of challenge due to his overwhelming strength.
